reference.title: Setting metadata ejection policy
reference.shortdesc: Bucket ejection from memory is set with couchbase-cli tool.

section.title: Description
section.p: Bucket ejection from memory is set with couchbase-cli tool, either bucket-create or bucket-edit, and the --bucket-eviction-policy parameter.

section.title: CLI command and parameter
section.p: The following is the tool, commands, and parameter used to set the policy for how to retain metadata in memory:
section.codeblock: couchbase-cli bucket-create --bucket-eviction-policy=[valueOnly | fullEviction] couchbase-cli bucket-edit --bucket-eviction-policy=[valueOnly | fullEviction]
